website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, slim, and surprisingly powerful, the Air may be Apple’s most affordable MacBook, but it is anything but cheap.
pros: Excellent for multitasking and basic gaming
Available in gold, silver, and space gray
cons: Its battery drains quickly if you don’t rely on Apple’s ecosystem of apps

customer_reviews.title: Camera has very bad performances
customer_reviews.text: It has been widely reported that the camera on the 2020 MacBook Air is low quality, but mine was definitely in the non-acceptable range. Picture was very grainy, unfocused, and low light level. I strongly suspect the glass in front of the video chip was damaged, perhaps for a contamination during assembly, but have now way of checking directly. Cleaning the outside had no effect. With heavy heart, I decided to return the unit, and buy an equivalent from the big-box store, where quality can (and will) be checked before purchasing. Update: refund for the item still pending, 14 working days after the returned item was delivered to Amazon. Worse than expected and worse than advertised (14 calendar days)
customer_reviews.author: Rosella Serinelli

customer_reviews.title: Better than Last Year's and Original MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: The original MacBook Air is retailing for like $749.99 right now. Don't buy that. It looks ugly and it's old. Buy the new refreshed 2020 model. This model is authentic, straight from Apple, and it looks fresh. One downside: Open it in a garage or something. I opened it in my room and my room smells like aluminum. Overall, this is a really good product for day-to-day use.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeev

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT AND FANTASTIC SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: it got shipped a day early, I've always wanted a MacBook Air and this is the way to go when ordering it, like I'm about to start college soon and I thought I would just share!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: madison carlisle

customer_reviews.title: SUPER ULTRA MEGA AWESOMETOSH
customer_reviews.text: What an upgrade over the 2017 Macbook air! Retina, magic keyboard, speakers, smaller form factor, finger print something-or-other, etc. When you hold it in your hand(s) it feel like a solid pice of aluminum. Totally pimptastic to the max. Getcha some!
customer_reviews.author: Delvin Douchebaggery

customer_reviews.title: AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: Great, exact product. perfect and authentic, made in California apple
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Slow - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook Air is extremely slow. Right out the box it was slow and even after updating it is still slow and seems to only be getting slower day by day. Returning. Avoid this rip-ff at all cost.
customer_reviews.author: Essence W.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe used.
customer_reviews.text: I suspect the MacBook Air I received was used. The computer could not found the hard drive, when I tried to use the recovery option, surprise, the computer was locked, possibly by the previous owner. It had fingerprints in the screen and the keyboard. I'm very dissapointed with Anazon, it's the first time I bought a NEW Macbook and instead received something that looks like being used, unusable and locked. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am in love best investment that I have made. I have been working from home and taking online classes. Makes it so convent and easy. Love the sound and feel of the keyboard. Webcam sucks but that’s not why I got it.
customer_reviews.author: aisia beamon

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: The laptop came in really good packaging and was really nice out of the box. But when I was starting everything up, the screen automatically went black and the fans turned on at a very high level. I called the apple support line but their methods of trying to restart the computer did not work. Very upset on how this turned out!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t purchase. You’ll be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely disappointed. As soon as I turned it on the fan was on super loud, it was slow and when I started time machine to begin a new backup it took forever. It was brand new out of the box and it sadly sucks. I’m returning after having it for a day. I had my IT family member take a look and they could no believe how slow it was. It rebooted on its own twice within the first hour of using it. I’m sadly returning it. I need a computer but this ain’t worth it. Save yourself and find something else. I’m a huge Apple fan but this really is awful.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The computer kept crashing!! It would start up, freeze and restart. I paid too much money for that to happen. I sent it back for a refund. I’m sooooo disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Talia Cotton LCS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the advertised “HD” camera. The camera is garbage. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Very worth getting for price and specs
customer_reviews.text: The new magic keyboard is amazing when typing. Unlike the 2019 MacBook Air. It’s so amazing how you pay $999 for double the storage you got form last year that’s starts at $1099. It’s is very fast and smooth. The only thing I don’t like is the noisy fan. The reason for this is because the MacBook is trying to run at its full potential for some stuff so from keeping it firm overheating the fan turns on. Besides that you should get it.
customer_reviews.author: Juana

customer_reviews.title: Does not work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It boots up, but shuts down and reboots ever five minutes. Brand new out of the box and it will not completely boot up, apple logo shows up on screen then computer shuts down and restarts every few minutes without ever completely booting up. I have returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Incapable of reading the order correctly!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a silver but got gold color! Specs are the same as I had requested though. Given current circumstances.. where I need a laptop badly to work from home...I don’t have a choice but to accept it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Hegde

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: From the perspective of someone who uses both Mac and PC. I wanted to give this a try because a few friends had recommended the new air to me. I didn’t expect much, but I got even less than expected. It’s just not very good. Yes, it’s a Mac product and it does work, but super slowly. It heats up very fast, and if you try having two applications open at the same time it freezes up. I don’t know why this has so many good reviews, other than people reviewing that don’t use their computer much/only like the look of a Mac. I recommend spending more to get something worth having, which is not this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to use my new Macbook however I was very dissapointed when I used it for a few days. The two biggest things this laptop is missing is a better processor (the 10th gen i3 just isn't enough to run Photoshop or any program efficiently) and it has a 720p camera. WTF Apple? What year is it. I dont think I've had any camera in 720p in over 6 years. The retina display is nice as always but it IS NOT WORTH THE PRICE!! You can get a much nicer laptop around the same price or cheaper. Look into the Lenovo Flex(i7, 16gb ram, 512gb ssd) is what I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s 2020 Apple-upgrade the crappy camera already.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it is 2020 and Apple can’t find the time to upgrade the MacBook Air camera is simply stupid. My X has a better camera than the 2020 Air. Despite repeated software reboots, for calls to Apple Care, no improvement. So I sent it all back from where it came.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Everything I have hoped for !🕺🏽🕺🏽
customer_reviews.text: Everything runs and works so far after two days usage.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading a couple reviews about the front camera I’ve come to find out that this is an common issue with macbooks coming from amazon and the support for this issue they offer is not any good
customer_reviews.author: Max Rigaud

customer_reviews.title: same as 2018
customer_reviews.text: nothing changed at all . same face time camera who puts 720 camera in laptop now apple are you out of your mind "?))
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I dont like that I paid all this money and it hasn't been a good month and they closed the return window I'm having so many problems with this it's crazy freezes all the time you cant power it off the cursor gets stuck and wont respond...bluetooth doesnt work I guess that's why they close the return window so early but doesnt tell you about the return before you purchase it ...I need my laptop to work its fir my business and if I cant get into my files when I need it what's the point ....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAST
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing to upgrade from my 8 year old MacBook Air for the last few months but wanted to wait for the 2020 model. The time has arrived and this product did not disappoint. First off, the gold color is vibrant. I didn't have a hard time migrating all my data and apps from my old MacBook to this new one (took maybe 3 hours, but I have iCloud), and everything is running seamlessly so far. Fast performance and will definitely be of great use once I get to editing all of my photos. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Too Hot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this MacAir to use for 6-8 hours of distance learning and teaching during The Corona pandemic. On day one of using the laptop after 6 hours of continuous use the machine had overheated to the point that even the internal fan could not keep it cool. The laptop was excessively hot to the touch. I unplugged it and contacted Apple. The customer service rep at Apple stated this particular laptop had had some cooling issues and made a suggestion for another model.
customer_reviews.author: Lookin' Pretty

customer_reviews.title: NO FULL REFUND ON DEFECTED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is defected. It has a faulty power supply. Not even 2 week with this new laptop its defected. I requested a refund and was short $100. Be careful when ordering through 3rd party. Even if you return the item before the estimated allowance they will still charge 20% restocking fee. Why should I pay $100 for a defected item? Not a happy customer!!! Very disappointed. No I will definitely be more careful whom I purchase from.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lynn Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this a week ago and have been loving it. I mostly got it to replace my old 2012 Mac mini. I just plan on using it for light work using Xcode, transferring files on external drives, web surfing and movie watching. i5, 512ssd ram and 8gb ram. I don't recommend this for playing video games. Works great with Apple Arcade. Keep in mind using apple software is optimized for better performance such as safari instead of chrome or Firefox, external apps and steam games.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: Apple Care Plus cancelled and Mac is not “eligible” with Apple
customer_reviews.text: Mac is great, however Amazon cancelled my AppleCare Plus and now I’m not “eligible”
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rooney

customer_reviews.title: I3 processor disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoping for the best but honestly, if you are used to a faster processor, do not buy this computer. If you’re looking for a basic computer to do basic things like surfing the internet and running a few different things at the same time but nothing major like video editing, then this computer is for you. I am honestly disappointed they would put an i3 processor in their base model computer but I guess you can’t get everything. Other than that, the size was definitely smaller than I’m comfortable with. Before purchasing, consider the speed because it will completely alter your experience in the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Addeo

customer_reviews.title: UI is cranky and clunky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop a week ago. It starts with frequently lagging when I click the mouse. Then, the UI becomes cranky and clunky. I didn’t pay much attention, but today, when I do a post on PowerPoint. It was suddenly shut down the PowerPoint. I lost all the progress I did before. Update: three time shutdown. Larger storage is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ku

customer_reviews.title: My fourth Mac Air, maybe the last (see update)
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is garbage: *maybe 3 hours when only surfing the web. FAN NOISE IS SO ANNOYING. I do like the keyboard and form factor, but so far I'm quite disappointed. UPDATE: I deleted and reinstalled the OS. It took some time, but the battery life much better and the fan only comes on once in a while. (note don't just reinstall OS: delete the old one, and reinstall) Now, it works like a normal Mac. But....I'm still wary.
customer_reviews.author: JJGites

customer_reviews.title: Sold on Mac
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Mac and having used a PC my whole life I was worried about the learning curve. This is a computer built for everyone and anyone. It is so user friendly, it’s like it knows what you want it to do. No bs, just common sense programming. Even my grandma could operate this laptop. I’m so happy with my decision to make the switch. I feel like I’ve been selling myself short until now!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Laptop came not responding with a blinking icon in center of screen
customer_reviews.author: Alan N

customer_reviews.title: For the daily writer, entrepreneur that doesn’t need photo/video work.
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for 2016+ MBP 15.4, but realized I don’t need the extra processing or ram. I got the i3 model with 8GB ram. Basic usage: writing emails, web browsing/Squarespace, Spotify, and Notes, Discord and FaceTime perfect efficiently without overheating. I don’t use Chrome, Safari is plenty fine and preferable since I can use keyboard shortcuts that Chrome won’t. Get the silver one, it’s stunning. Will be getting a dbrand skin for durability and peace of mind. Can’t wait to build out my desk to incorporate a 34” ultra wide monitor, camera and mic setup for work. This machine is snappy, competent and everything amazing about Apple quality and finish.
customer_reviews.author: vesper

customer_reviews.title: Solid device for BASIC taks
customer_reviews.text: this laptop is light, built well, reliable. Does it get hot, yes... under load. It comes with 8gb but 16GB would make a big difference in smoothness of use. I would suggest that this be limited to basic tasks such as using safari, word processing and presentations but multitasking beyond two apps...fans come on loudly and it slows down . If you're doing lots of Zoom and Google Meet while doing several other tasks or using the memory hungry Chrome browser ....I suggest looking at the Pro model instead.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best mac around
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a quality product (pretty, “affordable” and light) this is the one, i also have a 2018 15in macbook pro, and got to say this macbook air is amazing! It is crazy fast, display is super crispy, it is small but still the perfect size. If you are looking for a computer to browse, write and do heavy basic work (not any rendering, image, vidio or designe) this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Briceño

customer_reviews.title: On the fence? Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: Apple is just premium. The butterfly keyboard is gone and the magic keyboard has taken its place. Go for at least the quad core i5 and you'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DANJA

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer. Always wanted a MacBook and this was a great score for online classes. Thanks coronavirus
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I am so done with Windows being my primary O/S
customer_reviews.text: Decades working in Information technology, and an IT security professional, and the primary machines I want to work from are Apple laptops. I grew tired of IT managers issuing me PC's, so I just bought my own MacBook Air, and $#1+, I should have done this 5 years ago. Better machine, fast Unix based OS, my Linux virtual machines run better, no more messing with an OS that has held Microsoft's programmers back because they need to be compatible with decades of poorly written old Windows aps..Bye Windows, your messes & complexity provided a tech like me jobs for many years, but now you will only exist in my life as a virtual machine running on my Mac. Love, Joe
customer_reviews.author: Googly

customer_reviews.title: It’s a junk.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this from amazon. I don’t know this model is a junk? or they have sent a junk? Dead on arrival. Loud fan Extremely hot
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Not acceptable even as a secondary device
customer_reviews.text: Two things stop this laptop from being acceptable. 1. If you do video conferencing you're going to look pixelated to other attendees. The camera is unacceptable even for a MBA. 2. The "quad core i5" in mine might as well be an i3; it music cuts out when I'm listening to podcasts and challenging the device by surfing the web. It's underpowered for multitasking. I wanted to believe that by upgrading to the higher echelon model I'd be ditching a lot of the complaints I read about, but I've immediately found that's not the case. No getting around the 2GHz MBP 13" in my world - hoping at least that can handle two things at once with a decent camera.
customer_reviews.author: E. R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Runs WAY TOO HOT!!! Avoid at all costs until this is fixed.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth straight MacBook including last year's model (the prior Air). I use my machines for very basic tasks and this one overheats way too easily. Never had this issue before. Poor design that will be fixed but who needs that at this price. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I am loving my 1st MacBook Air!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my MacBook Air today and I am loving it! The keyboard is great and just overall everything is great about it. Except the fan on it. It's a little loud but I can manage :) Other than that it is a really cool and great laptop for anyone I highly recommend it!!! :) P.s. especially If it is your first macbook air lol
customer_reviews.author: Ivykygirl718

customer_reviews.title: Apple wins again!
customer_reviews.text: This was my final Apple purchase to complete my “collection” if you will. I’ve wanted this MacBook Air for SOOO long and Apple did not disappoint! It is such a beautiful design and extremely user friendly. It’s my first Mac and I was able to turn it on and start using it right away. My favorite feature so far is handoff and how well it syncs with all my other Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even put into words how much I love my MacBook! At first I was hesitant to spend so much! But after buying 3 different computers in the past 5 years. I took a leap and bought a MacBook after many research and many great reviews! So far I LOVE MINE!! It took some getting use to coming from an HP to a MacBook. But I picked up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly like the old models. 🤬
customer_reviews.text: Apple is supposed to be easy. All I want to do is download a few CDs into iTunes. DVD drives don't work so I bought an expensive Apple drive that doesn't fit, so I bought a adapted. Now it says accessory USB needs power. On-line support is not helpful. Downloading files for my 3D printer was a pain too. I had to use 3ed party software and go through loopholes ever time. I like the look and feel of the product but everything is over complicated and requires extra parts. I loved my Macbook Pro 2010, it's sad the new models suck so bad.
customer_reviews.author: daniel laporta

customer_reviews.title: New Apple MacBook Air 512 GB SSD storage
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it four stars, because I guess I don’t need that much space on my MacBook. I wish I would’ve saved myself the extra $300 or some dollars by getting the lesser SSD storage space version. Other than that. It’s a nice laptop and worth the extra $49 amazon charges over apple for the faster delivery. I will update my review once I start using my MacBook more.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Wood

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: Such a hassle to return...the screen Glitch could give someone seizures. Must have been mishandled during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: IF YOUR THINKING ABOUT BUYING.. DO IT
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Macbook Air about an hour ago. Its so pretty. Its working good. The camera quality isn’t the best. Its like the quality of the IPhone 11 Pro Max when you first get it lol. But its not bad. I like it. Nothing is wrong with it so far. Came brand new. Its nice & cute.I bought Apple Care with it also. For the price.. ITS AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Aislynne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Keyboard Design. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on April 22, 2020 and the same day I got it, my wife already started getting keyboard problems with the spacebar. I looked up some research and apparently the butterfly keyboard design is giving a TON of people all sorts of issues. We even tried installing the Unshaky app, and mess with the apple keyboard preferences. I honesty think charging this much money with a flaw design is a waste of money, especially at this stage for Apple. They're are a lot of other laptops that will work better than this.
customer_reviews.author: John Vigil

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: I love my MacBook Air. It takes a little learning curve if you're coming from a Windows PC environment but easy to learn. Having an iPhone MS Max and a iPad Pro helped in the learning curve. The only negative is that I'm disappointed in the battery life. I need to charge it every 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Warner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take too long to show up and I absolutely love it. The gold is a nice color, not too yellow. It's more of a rose gold which I absolutely adore. The keys are nice and smooth and the screen it bright. It holds a nice charge, especially when I play the sims with a pretty bright screen. Its fast too, which is a HUGE step up from my last computer. Overall I'm very very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: not 13", but amazing otherwise!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very simple laptop for someone like me! I'm tech savvy enough to get around and use some special features, but I also lack the ability that some have for a more in depth PC experience. My only complaint it that the actual dimensions were more like 12", so I think I may have to spend more money on apples website to get a case. Curse you, apple!
customer_reviews.author: Levi H.

customer_reviews.title: This is my new ultimate computer
customer_reviews.text: First thing I like was that it is very light weight yet, it is very durable and not cheaply made. I have been searching for the right Macbook at the right specs and the right price. This Mac has given me all that. I have 512 GB of HDD space. It has a SSD for a fast boot up. Even the reboot is quick. What I like about it is there is no AntiVirus needed to install to hunker down my computer. Just do the update patches when requested. My windows PC has a lifespan of 5 years for the last 3 PCs. I'm expecting this one to last me at least 10.
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo Penninella

customer_reviews.title: Was a little skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie, I was kind of worried when I ordered this. But it turns out that there is no reason to be worried at all. This macbook is the same that apple would send you themselves, just with faster delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, durable, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: To start off, the MacBook booted up quickly and the set up was easy. The camera sucks but that isn’t what I need the MacBook for, I needed it for online college courses and it seems like it will hold up well for that. Very light weight laptop which is amazing. The battery life seems to be good. I received the MacBook yesterday and so far so good. I will try to give an update after a month or so again. I would recommend this computer to others!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and light weight a MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine in the mail today it was supposed to come yesterday but it wasn't amazons fault it was ups but overall I am happy its so lite and I love the keybord the only thing I dislike is that it only has 2 ports on the side but I'm going to order the connecters today so I can plug my speakers and other things up overall its worth the money and def get apple care because you never know what could happen I'm so excited I have all apple products my last Mac that I got was in 2015 Apple did a great job with this Mac air
customer_reviews.author: Her❤️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding device--but--a shabby camera
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using a MAC product--and I admit--I had to get used to the system. But once that was done, this laptop is beautiful in form and feature. High quality screen, and fast! I was concerned with being able to download apps I use. However, with the correct downloading procedures, my fears were unfounded. Unfortunately, the camera is grainy and dull, which is odd in light of the top quality of this device. It's too bad Apple cannot enhance the MacBook Air's camera quality to match the high quality cameras found on their iPads, and iPhones. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Mellanee Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I bought it for my work and am very happy with it. I paid extra for more storage space, but I had some issues getting things transferred from my iPhone and iPad to the MacBook. I would move things over and delete them from other devices and they would be deleted completely from the laptop as well (which defeated the purpose of having extra storage space and clearing out my cloud). I just turned off the iCloud and airdropped. So I suppose it was just my personal user tech problem. Maybe other people are more tech savvy. But anyway, all and all, I am so happy with this. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: luvbug

customer_reviews.title: Happy I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Just received two days ago and it is working great for me. Responsive and fast compared to my HP. No issues setting it up and it is just what I hoped it would be. So far so good. The speakers are amazing. I was skeptical after reading some of the negative reviews, but I saw a few glowing ones and crossed my fingers I would get one like them. I have heard no whirring sound from it. And no more heat than any other laptop I have had, actually less heat than the last Dell I had. I will be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Dixiebelle

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th MacBook I've owned over the years & by far the best one yet! It's quite a bit smaller than the original 13" MacBook Air & has been a pure joy to use. I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Culwell

customer_reviews.title: Ooops
customer_reviews.text: So I was caught off guard that there is no USB ports at all!!!! Also different charger, why does apple always change the charger types!?
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Am I color blind?
customer_reviews.text: I requested a Gold laptop but got a Rose one. The sticker at the bottom of the box states it is Gold, but the picture on the top of the box shows a Rose laptop. Is this a Chinese joke on us? The laptop works great, but I was expecting the Gold laptop I actually requested! Am I color blind?
customer_reviews.author: Juan Arvelo

customer_reviews.title: The speed is a little slow!
customer_reviews.text: I originally received the wrong Item, so I just got the replacement today. Bought this for my sister to work remotely. She likes the design of it ,but it is kind of sluggish out of box. Will see how it performs after updating. 4 stars rating for now.
customer_reviews.author: Thinh D. Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Laptop!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new MacBook Air 2020! It is adorable, lightweight, sturdy, fast, easy to use, and has an amazing and comfortable keyboard!!! And Amazon got it to me in one day! I waited two weeks to get it from Apple and when the delays continued I decided to order from Amazon instead.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: batterie
customer_reviews.text: mines dies within 24 hours of use idk if that’s normal...
customer_reviews.author: chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Works great and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for online teaching. Very easy to setup and sync to my Mac to get the data and apps from it. Some have complained about the camera. I do notice that the video quality when you start FaceTime can be grainy for some reasons, but it resolves after a few seconds. Highly recommend. (Note to Amazon: when you offer a lower price within 1-2 days of a customer receiving their order, just give them the difference back to their form of payment. Making me erase my personal data and ship back the first one is a waste of time and money.)
customer_reviews.author: bmbutler

customer_reviews.title: Worth air
customer_reviews.text: But this one dont buy the old ones. The very own boring “magic keyboard” (implemented and marketed as “new feature”) is a deal breaker itself since it uses a reliable standard scissor-switch mechanism plus the rest specs will do the works (dont expect high performance with the i3 though) plus since it runs macOs (proprietary software) you have wider range of os’s options able to run windows an linux if you want to
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: The picture of Catalina Island changes with the time of day! How Apple! Everything moves around lickety-split. I'm a fan, not a computer nerd. Just a retired guy who appreciates a good laptop.This is perfect for my needs of writing and communicating.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brustowicz

customer_reviews.title: 2020 macbook air
customer_reviews.text: So I've been seeing alot of negative problems about heating and air problems and a loud fan. Personally I haven't had any issues so far it's been 2 months it's like brand new! I loved it the speed is amazing the camera is like any other laptop. I'm a college student so it definitely came in handy for I'm definitely going to order another one for work. :)
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the fence for awhile now on purchasing a computer from Amazon, but I am so glad that I made the plunge and purchased this MacBook Air! I am a cheap-o, and I believe this product is worth every penny. Its so nice that I barely want to use it haha. Great product, and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maegin Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, even if new to Mac's
customer_reviews.text: I'm very much a simple minded guy, especially when it comes to computers, but when my old one died, I researched for a new one and the MacBook air always had great reviews. Then the new model came out on discount so I took a chance. Glad I did! It was super easy to set up and use: and I never used a Mac before. I am looking forward to years of satisfaction with such an efficient, user friendly, and reliable product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What can I say?
customer_reviews.text: Old timer who has used every version of Windows from DOS to version 10. Finally grew weary of the endless updates. The last one took over eight hours. The next morning, there were four more, and another one the next day. Meantime, I couldn’t use my laptop for writing due to the lagginess with background downloads. I love my Ipad and finally bit the bullet. I couldn't be happier. My new 256gb MacBook Air is what Windows should be. I’m not an Apple fanboy, but I sure am a fan. At least so far. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Air 2020 Review
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Apple products and this is my first time buying a MacBook Air and I LOVE IT OMG this laptop is so lightweight and chic. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. I love the keyboard it like typing on clouds, and the RETINE DISPLAY IS AMAZING. Overall, this is a really good investment and worth the money, plus don't have to worry about VIRUSES.
customer_reviews.author: JTboi21

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It came 3 days early, brand new, in box, Apple box sealed as well. Couldn’t be happier with the new design.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my studies!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in 1 day! 100% authentic and new 2020 MacBook air with the new magic keyboard (works great). Works seconds out of the box and is simple to use. I have always loved the MacOS operating system and this MacBook runs it beautifully while still being very light and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Bella D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok I like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice, I like all the features I hate that the new ones have adapters. I’m old school I like my usb inserted into my laptop. I feel like the battery dies kinda fast but charges quick
customer_reviews.author: Nicole White

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: My last computer was a Macbook Pro from 2013 and it was starting to go. This new MacBook Air is amazing. I did not realize how convenient the fingerprint ID would be, the keyboard and keys feel amazing, and it's so light and thin. I only use my computer for schoolwork, administrative tasks, and social media, so I cannot speak to those who use video editing software or anything that requires buying a MacBook Pro. For being a laptop I can use for everyday tasks and assignments, I am so delighted with this Air.
customer_reviews.author: david manuel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Everything
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to Mac, and I love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: B.H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Camera quality sucks but I mean its a laptop.. why are you taking pictures from a laptop in 2020?? Battery life is good. I can use it for several hours without it dying. Very lightweight. Product came in GREAT condition. Only problem I have is when I put my phone by the screen, the screen glitches. Idk if thats just me or if that happens to everyone. The laptop barely overheats. Actually, the laptop never really gets hot. I love this laptop. Keyboard is great! Easy to type and use. I use this laptop for regular use (nothing fancy) and it works like a charm for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shanise Curry

customer_reviews.title: Worth Purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: My Very First MacBook Air & I Must Say! I Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, great laptop, enjoy iOS ecosystem
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned an iPhone for a long time but I’m a first time Mac user... now I understand the hype. If you need something heavy duty get a Mac book pro. I wish I got the i5 version for $100 more instead so I can easily use full features with apps like Zoom but no regrets, handles most of my usage with ease. Heats up a bit because of its thinness but doesn’t impact performance drastically. Great screen! Super lightweight! Amazon delivered 14 days before Best Buy told me they would have more in stock. Definitely go with Amazon on this one!
customer_reviews.author: cesar bucio

customer_reviews.title: YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE GETTING WHEN YOU BUY A MACBOOK
customer_reviews.text: IT'S A REASON WHY MACBOOK IS CONSIDERED THE KING....WINDOW'S USER EITHER GET A MACBOOK, OR CONTINUE GOING THROUGH YOU VIRUS HEADACHES
customer_reviews.author: Amazon9669

customer_reviews.title: MACBook sir purchase...AAA!!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done - came works pretty easy to use (it’s a Mac) only draw back unsure if the usb or USB adapter device is giving an error (too many devices) you should be able to connect an external hard drive and cd:dvd e/o an error. Overall I would recommend this product especially for the price. We went with the 256 as the 500gb was $200 more (a 1TB SSD is &$100) you don’t have to be an expert to put a hard drive in - just a clean place and good set of eyes Battery life camera quality fingerprint reader - two of these are not reasons to purchase a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: TopCat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy
customer_reviews.text: The product was new like it said it would be. I was skeptical at first buying a new Mac laptop on amazon and also seeing the cheaper pricing, but after some research I decided to take a chance. The laptop came in full packaging like it came from apple. I've been using laptop for less than a week but it seems to hold battery pretty good. The camera was not the best but I knew that in buying the new 2020 MacBook Air. Next time I will probably get more Ram because I like to play sims 4 and it makes the laptop heat up a lot. Other than that it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: good computer for browsing entertainment and basic work
customer_reviews.text: the computer is good, great build quality, and powerful enough to to some basic graphic work, but it will not replace your work computer. Great for media consumption and browsing the net. Again the build quality is something that apple still has the edge on, but its not powerful enough to take on a really heavy work flow on it. I still like it :)
customer_reviews.author: Solid

customer_reviews.title: Early Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a birthday present and I couldn't be more satisfied. It came a day earlier than the expected delivery date and the packaging was easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop..
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying my laptop it's fast and easy to set up. It's light weight the color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Always a fan!
customer_reviews.text: Always a fan of Apple products and this is a replacement for another older Mac Book Air. I’m happy with the fingerprint reader making it faster to use. I also got the rose gold and like that a lot. It stands out. I was not a fan of the voice activated setup and once I figured a work around, it was easy to set up. I felt like Apple got a bit too techy and made something easy harder.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I did not feel the sensation of a new product.
customer_reviews.text: The product that came to me is not new, the cover appears with micro-scratches. The charger cable arrived wrapped in an ordinary rubber band. I did not feel the sensation of a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mac!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it bought it to work from home and it works great! It works really good no lagging and I use a very complicated work application and i have had no issues! Impressed best laptop I have ever had! Only downside is battery life my work application drains the battery so I have to charge up several times throughout the day but that my only complaint is the battery could be a bit better!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time and in perfect condition. Better than I expect for my first Mac. So glad I invested in something new.
customer_reviews.author: Aislinn

customer_reviews.title: Camera sucks!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is way worse than my 2016 macbook air wtf!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymes Schulte

customer_reviews.title: So cool to unlock with your finger
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts a loooong time. You'll probably need a USB adapter, but they're cheap. The frame is slightly smaller than their last model, which is nice. I've had it three weeks -- no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Crosby K

customer_reviews.title: owned for 2 months and got BSOD
customer_reviews.text: I bought a mac for my daughter going to college because i had heard how great the products are and how well they work. Today my daughter's macbook ( bought 2 months ago) died while in a class at college and restarted and would not come back on. My wife had to drive 3 hours to take her another computer to do her test at college. We can't take the mac into any apple store because they are all closed!!!! I should have bought a different product. This is so frustrating to pay a PREMIUM for this!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Evans

customer_reviews.title: Recommended pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer especially for being used and not the newest gen. It has minor problems like it would glitch our when I would open my google drive and that was pretty much my purpose for buying this computer but there are other ways to get around it. The battery life actually lasts longer than expected but it goes semi fast once its below 50%. I was a little disappointed with the camera quality but its not too bad. The mic works well so far. I am really impressed tbh!!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Mcglennon

customer_reviews.title: love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I want to first start by addressing the one star for fingerprint; that is only due to the fact that I did not use it yet. Otherwise, this Retina display has helped a lot with my eyesight! I worked in an office setting and it was not very easy on my eyes. Also, this has so far been the best laptop I can purchase when producing music or just for everyday convenience. Not the mention, the color is awesome! If I left something out, that is a mistake. Overall, great price and great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop several months ago and still haven't figured it out. I haven't been able to use it. I had a Apple computer at one time and I loved it. So I thought I would get a Apple laptop. Wrong decision. I can't even get it set up. I would not recommend getting it. I have never had an issue in the past setting anything set up.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieD

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: My Lenovo X1 Carbon finally bit the dust. I was a little hesitant to switch to Mac but this laptop is eassy to use and performs great. Best of all i was able to install windows 10 via Boot Camp Assistant (included) and was able to register it with my old Lenovo registration. So basically i have a Mac and windows laptop for the same price!
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item since I was working from home/ taking classes online due to COVID19. The computer is greater but I have two complaints: 1. I've charged the computer 10 times so far since my purchase and the battery dropped from 100% to 99% of its capacity. Seems weird to me that it's happening so quickly. 2. Amazon lost the first computer I ordered and I had to deal with customer service. They were able to get it expedited overnight because of the urgency, but it wasn't without some hassle on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase! Never owned a MacBook in the past and I love it. Takes time to get used to some functions but I don't plan on going back to windows. I am told that these things last forever so I am hoping that lives up to the saying. Greatest investment ever!
customer_reviews.author: Anel

product_meta.title: Apple MacBook Air (13-inch, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD Storage) - Gold (Latest Model)
feature_bullets: Stunning 13.3-inch Retina display with True Tone technology
Backlit Magic Keyboard and Touch ID
Stereo speakers with wider stereo sound
Up to 11 hours of battery life
